pages.title: Overview
pages.purpose: Introduce ComparIA, explaining its mission to provide transparent AI model comparison and build French-language preference datasets

pages.title: System Architecture
pages.purpose: Describe the high-level architecture showing how frontend, backend, LLM providers, and data pipeline interact

pages.title: Backend System
pages.purpose: Document the FastAPI and Gradio backend architecture, explaining the core server components

pages.title: Arena Interface
pages.purpose: Detailed documentation of the core arena system including event listeners, conversation management, and user interaction flow

page_notes.content: don't forget 'reactions' in the user interaction flow

pages.title: LLM Integration
pages.purpose: Explain how ComparIA integrates with multiple LLM providers through LiteLLM, including configuration and credentials management

pages.title: Model Metadata System
pages.purpose: Document the model metadata pipeline, including validation, enrichment, and impact calculation

pages.title: Logging and Observability
pages.purpose: Describe the logging infrastructure including PostgreSQL handlers, JSONL files, Redis and Sentry integration

pages.title: Frontend System
pages.purpose: Overview of the SvelteKit frontend architecture, routing, and state management

pages.title: Arena User Interface
pages.purpose: Document the arena user journey from prompt input through chat, voting, and model reveal

pages.title: Ranking System
pages.purpose: Explain the ranking visualization system including ELO scores, energy graphs, and preference tables

pages.title: Model Catalog
pages.purpose: Document the model listing and filtering interface, including the ModelCard and ModelInfoModal components

pages.title: Product Information Pages
pages.purpose: Describe the static product pages including comparator features, problem statements, FAQ, and partners

pages.title: Internationalization
pages.purpose: Document the i18n system supporting French, English, Swedish, Danish, and Lithuanian

pages.title: Chat Service and API Client
pages.purpose: Explain the frontend's chat service layer, API communication, and state management

pages.title: Data Pipeline
pages.purpose: Overview of the data collection, anonymization, and export pipeline for building public datasets

pages.title: Data Collection and Storage
pages.purpose: Document how user interactions are captured and stored in PostgreSQL and JSONL files

pages.title: Export and Anonymization
pages.purpose: Explain the export pipeline that anonymizes data and publishes to Hugging Face datasets

pages.title: Ranking Pipeline
pages.purpose: Document the ranking calculation pipeline including ELO computation, bootstrap confidence intervals, and frugality scores

pages.title: Deployment and Configuration
pages.purpose: Guide for deploying ComparIA including Docker setup, environment variables, and service orchestration

pages.title: Docker Deployment
pages.purpose: Detailed documentation of Docker Compose setup, image builds, and service configuration

pages.title: Environment Variables
pages.purpose: Comprehensive reference for all environment variables used across backend and frontend

pages.title: LLM Provider Configuration
pages.purpose: Guide for configuring and registering LLM API endpoints including OpenRouter, Vertex AI, and custom providers

pages.title: Development Guide
pages.purpose: Guide for developers including local setup, testing, and contribution guidelines

pages.title: Local Development Setup
pages.purpose: Step-by-step instructions for setting up the development environment

pages.title: Frontend Development
pages.purpose: Guide for working with the SvelteKit frontend including component structure and styling

pages.title: Backend Development
pages.purpose: Guide for working with the FastAPI/Gradio backend including adding new models and extending functionality
